00021 #include "ProbeSetMultiDataData.h"
00022 #include <sstream>
00023 
00024 u_int8_t affymetrix_calvin_data::ChromosomeFromString(const std::string& chr)
00025 {
00026   int chrValue = atoi(chr.c_str());
00027   if (chrValue == 0)
00028     {
00029       if (chr == "X" || chr == "x")
00030         chrValue = X_CHR;
00031       else if (chr == "Y" || chr == "y")
00032         chrValue = Y_CHR;
00033       else if (chr == "MT" || chr == "mt")
00034         chrValue = MT_CHR;
00035       else
00036         chrValue = NO_CHR;
00037     }
00038   return chrValue;
00039 }
00040 
00041 std::string affymetrix_calvin_data::ChromosomeToString(u_int8_t chr)
00042 {
00043   if (chr == X_CHR)
00044     return "X";
00045   else if (chr == Y_CHR)
00046     return "Y";
00047   else if (chr == MT_CHR)
00048     return "MT";
00049   else if (chr == NO_CHR)
00050     return "-";
00051   else
00052     {
00053       std::ostringstream str;
00054       str << (int)chr;
00055       return str.str();
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00059 u_int8_t affymetrix_calvin_data::CytoCallFromString(const std::string &call)
00060 {
00061     if (call == "A")
00062         return CYTO_ABSENT_CALL;
00063 
00064     else if (call == "P")
00065         return CYTO_PRESENT_CALL;
00066 
00067     else
00068         return CYTO_NO_CALL;
00069 }
00070 
00071 std::string affymetrix_calvin_data::CytoCallToString(u_int8_t call)
00072 {
00073     switch (call)
00074     {
00075     case CYTO_ABSENT_CALL:
00076         return "A";
00077         break;
00078 
00079     case CYTO_PRESENT_CALL:
00080         return "P";
00081         break;
00082 
00083     default:
00084         return "NC";
00085         break;
00086     }
00087 }
00088 
00089 u_int8_t affymetrix_calvin_data::GenotypeCallFromString(const std::string &call)
00090 {
00091     if (call == "A" || call == "AA")
00092         return SNP_AA_CALL;
00093 
00094     else if (call == "B" || call == "BB")
00095         return SNP_BB_CALL;
00096 
00097         else if (call == "AB")
00098         return SNP_AB_CALL;
00099 
00100     else
00101         return SNP_NO_CALL;
00102 }
00103 
00104 std::string affymetrix_calvin_data::GenotypeCallToString(u_int8_t call)
00105 {
00106     switch (call)
00107     {
00108     case SNP_AA_CALL:
00109         return "A";
00110         break;
00111 
00112     case SNP_AB_CALL:
00113         return "AB";
00114         break;
00115 
00116     case SNP_BB_CALL:
00117         return "BB";
00118         break;
00119 
00120     default:
00121         return "No Call";
00122         break;
00123     }
00124 }
